segments.text: I love slim girls , don ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not particularly . I like fat girls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I like a girl with good skin , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ’ t say I do . What I like a girl with good manners .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , yes . But surely you like a girl with a nice figure .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But I like a girl with a nice personality .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you like a girl to be rich , surely ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not particularly . I like a girl to be good .
segments.speaker: S2
